reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that personal data is collected when users register on the app, purchase premium services, or claim free offers. This declaration confirms that the app collects data.
reply.reference: We receive personal data directly from you when you register on our apps, when you purchase some of our premium services, and/or claim our free offers. URL: http://www.gambless.org/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: Name, e-mail address, language preference, read newsletters, clicked links in newsletters

reply.analysis: The app declares the collection of personal data including the user's name, e-mail address, language preference, information about read newsletters, and clicked links in newsletters.
reply.reference: Your name, e-mail address and language preference. In addition, data might be processed regarding which newsletters you have read and what links in the newsletter you clicked on to enable us to follow up and improve our content. URL: http://www.gambless.org/privacy-policy/

10. Embedded content from other sources
Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app informs users of why data is collected and how it will be used, ensuring transparency about the purpose of data collection.
reply.reference: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used. URL: http://www.gambless.org/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt-out of data collection and request the deletion of their data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can opt out from certain communications and processing of their data. Users have the right to request the erasure of their personal data.

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app does not share any personally identifying information publicly or with third parties, except when required by law. This indicates that data is not shared with third parties under normal circumstances.
reply.reference: We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law. URL: http://www.gambless.org/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with companies and contractors that perform services, including email service providers, payment processors, fraud prevention vendors, and other service providers.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app shares data with various entities for different purposes. Specifically, information is shared with companies and contractors for service provision, such as email services and payment processing.
reply.reference: By contract, with companies and contractors that perform services for us, including email service providers, payment processors, fraud prevention vendors, spam detection and other service providers; URL: http://www.gambless.org/privacy-policy/
